title: Alloying Ni4Mo for Efficient Alkaline Hydrogen Oxidation and Hydrogen Evolution Reactions
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00179F, Communication
Pengfei Cao, Xinxin Zhang, Lei Wang, Honggang Fu
Developing low-cost transitional metal electrocatalysts to substitute advance noble metal is significant for hydrogen electrocatalysis, including hydrogen oxidation (HOR) and hydrogen evolution (HER) reactions. Ni-based materials exhibit a high potential...
